item.title: Install_luminance_ubuntu
item.description: How to install luminance HDR in ubuntu install dependecies 1 sudo apt install -y qtcreator qtbase5-dev qt5-qmake cmake libexiv2-dev libtiff-dev libraw-dev libpng-dev libjpeg-dev libopenexr-dev libfftw3-dev libboost-all-dev libcfitsio-dev libgsl-dev This command installs the following dependencies: QT5 development tools exiv2 library libtiff library libraw library libpng library libjpeg library libopenexr library fftw3 library libboost library cfitsio library Gnu Gsl library sudo apt install qttools5-dev sudo apt-get install qttools5-dev-tools sudo apt install libqt5webkit5-dev sudo apt-get install libqt5svg5-dev sudo apt-get install libeigen3-dev
